Detailed Description

template<typename VarArray>
struct BoolBinarySATConstraintDynamic< VarArray >

Specialised SAT implementation for just 2 variables.

template<typename VarArray>
virtual bool BoolBinarySATConstraintDynamic< VarArray >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
